de.team33.libs.reflect.v4

Interface Fields.Streaming

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Function<Class<?>,Stream<Field>>
    Enclosing class:
    Fields
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface Fields.Streaming
extends Function<Class<?>,Stream<Field>>
    Defines some typical Functions that serve to stream Fields of a given Class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Fields.Streaming DEEP
      Streams all Fields declared by a given Class or any of its superclasses.
      static Fields.Streaming FLAT
      Streams all Fields straightly declared by a given Class
      static Fields.Streaming INSTANCE_DEEP
      Streams all non-static Fields declared by a given Class or any of its superclasses.
      static Fields.Streaming INSTANCE_FLAT
      Streams all non-static Fields straightly declared by a given Class.
      static Fields.Streaming SIGNIFICANT_DEEP
      Streams all non-static/non-transient Fields declared by a given Class or any of its superclasses.
      static Fields.Streaming SIGNIFICANT_FLAT
      Streams all non-static/non-transient Fields straightly declared by a given Class.
      static Fields.Streaming WIDE
      Streams all Fields declared by a given Class, any of its superclasses or any of its superinterfaces.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Function

        andThen, apply, compose, identity

    • Field Detail

      • FLAT

        static final Fields.Streaming FLAT
        Streams all Fields straightly declared by a given Class

      • DEEP

        static final Fields.Streaming DEEP
        Streams all Fields declared by a given Class or any of its superclasses.

      • WIDE

        static final Fields.Streaming WIDE
        Streams all Fields declared by a given Class, any of its superclasses or any of its superinterfaces.

      • INSTANCE_FLAT

        static final Fields.Streaming INSTANCE_FLAT
        Streams all non-static Fields straightly declared by a given Class.

      • INSTANCE_DEEP

        static final Fields.Streaming INSTANCE_DEEP
        Streams all non-static Fields declared by a given Class or any of its superclasses.

      • SIGNIFICANT_FLAT

        static final Fields.Streaming SIGNIFICANT_FLAT
        Streams all non-static/non-transient Fields straightly declared by a given Class. Those fields should be significant for a simple type with value semantics.

      • SIGNIFICANT_DEEP

        static final Fields.Streaming SIGNIFICANT_DEEP
        Streams all non-static/non-transient Fields declared by a given Class or any of its superclasses. Those fields should be significant for a type with value semantics.
